rows.label: tlk70000123_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Look! Dolala have great confidence
in own stamina!

rows.label: tlk70000123_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Dolala hope to become Driver
and stand at very front to soak
up enemy attacks!

rows.label: tlk70000123_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Mo! But thinking carefully, can Dolala
beat enemies just by taking damage?

rows.label: tlk70000123_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Might need friends to attack enemy
and to heal Dolala too... Must find
some quick!
